name: Jumping Jacques!
description:
Jacques the Jumping spider want good view.
Help Jacques obtain the bestest view by climb beanstalk!

Hold jump button to charge jump; aim left or right, let go of jump. and Jacques go BOING!!

 - CONTROLS -

This game supports both keyboard and gamepad controls. The controls described below assumes an Xbox-style controller layout. Of course, a Dualshock or Nintendo Switch controller still works.

Jump:
- Keyboard: Hold Space/W/Up Arrow
- Controller: Hold (A) or DPad Up

Pause:
- Keyboard: Escape
- Controller: Start

Switch Color Palette:
- Keyboard: Tab
- Controller: Select

While charging a jump, use the directional keys to aim your jump left or right.

- CREDITS -

Programmer: Patrick Østergaard

Graphics: Jur Loogman

Level Design: Julian Creutz

Music: Parker Walker

Made with Godot 3.5 for GBJAM 10.
